website_summaries.verdict: The HP Pavilion Chromebook 14 is the first Chrome device from HP, blending the best of a budget Pavilion with the web-friendly Chrome OS.
pros: Larger display makes multitasking much easier
Larger keyboard allows room for extra function keys and more comfortable typing
Plastic construction, though clearly budget-friendly, feels solid
cons: Comes with all the usual caveats about Chrome OS

customer_reviews.title: Oh see now I love this, just logged into my google account and ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh see now I love this, just logged into my google account and everything is just there, no faffing, no messing, plug it in and off you go - I wanted this because the number keys are across the top and I struggle with the position on my knee if the digits are to one side. Keyboard is a little noisy but it seems to have some quirky functions that my old laptop doesn't have - hoping that with use the keys will settle in and get quieter. The easiest and by far the cheapest lap top that I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: A. Summers

customer_reviews.title: New OS - New world
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laptop for the kids so they can browse the web and do school projects. Its now the family laptop and go to device for surfing the web. You have to hunt for it in the kitchen, lounge, bathroom and bedrooms! Chrome OS - so far I'm impressed. Everything in the browser. Boots really fast and no virus' to worry about, plus it won't slow down over time like a Windoze. Chromebook - HP built this one a bit plastic, but I'm used to Macbook Pros. Screen is good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: R G Child

customer_reviews.title: Fast, cheap and as good as promised
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid to order a Chromebook because it's very different from any other type of laptop. I'm greatly impress by it's speed booting. It's very flexible to use if you work within the Google environment. My kids love it and I'm thinking about buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Just....wow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my partner. She doesn't play games (unless you count Fairyland or Candy Crush) and doesn't want to. She wants to do Word docs etc, and take them to work to deal with further. This boots up in literally under 10 seconds from cold, is almost silent, and the speakers are very good indeed. The screen is clear and the colours are fab. 5 stars - I am considering buying another one, as it lets me ready my Kindle books, and listen to my Amazon tunes as well. Fab.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Robert W. Surface

customer_reviews.title: Great for the web.
customer_reviews.text: Flip the lid, click a button and your on the web. It really is as easy as that, with this chromebook. Looks great aswell, with a very shiny surface. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Legs Eleven

customer_reviews.title: HP chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for using on the internet. google docs etc is well laid out and easy to use. If you are planning on writing essays at uni though I would install word processor so that you can make flow charts etc and group objects
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with laptop... Previously had computer but took up a lot of room, this is ideal for our families use
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H. Goldsbrough

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Fine for nearly all of our needs and so much faster and easier to use than Windows. We miss Skype but that's about all.
customer_reviews.author: J C J Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic - Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic purchase ! Bought this as a present for elederly relative. She loves it ! Does exactly what was required - simple to use , fast , excellent for browsing the internet , youtube, email ,slim , relatively light , nice large clear screen. The only alternative for this price was a netbook - no comparison - highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: judith hall

customer_reviews.title: Every bit as good as a more expensive laptop.
customer_reviews.text: No waiting to start up,open the lid and you're on line.No need to shut down if you don't want to,very fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake22

customer_reviews.title: does every thing.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and you get all the basic stuff you need for everyday pc use. With the money I saved [was going to purchase a ipad] I have treated myself to a mini ipad. Happy days ,yes indeed !
customer_reviews.author: mark d

customer_reviews.title: no CD
customer_reviews.text: this does not have a cd portal other wise it would have been perfect but hey i guess this is what you get for £200
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It's okey
customer_reviews.text: Though with lots of complication many people do not know how to use it. It's okey once you understand how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: IDRIS HASSAN

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Product purchased for a college student. small lightweight sleek design at a bargain price. Not sure about ease of set up as was buoght on behalf of someone
customer_reviews.author: Chun McRae

customer_reviews.title: A great device
customer_reviews.text: A really great device if you can cope with cloud computing. Super reliable and very quick to start up. Very rarely use my mac now as cloud computing does most stuff I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dodgy charger or overheat problem!
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought mine from Argos. Worked great for a couple of days, then died. Could be charger problem, or overheat, HP laptops seem to have reputation for both, chromebook or otherwise. I am a big fan of the chromebook concept, already own nexus 7, 10 and use Google docs, drive, gmail, etc. For those already familiar with Google products, this is a great item. Very fast. Screen was excellent, good size compared to the others at similar price. Was not that keen on the touchpad, preferred others I tried in shops. I will buy another chromebook, however may wait for Samsung/Acer to make a 14 inch version, with 3g.
customer_reviews.author: weekend lumberjack

product_meta.title: HP Pavilion Chromebook (14-c025us) 14", Dual-core 1.10 GHz - 4GB DDR3 SDRAM 16GB SSD
product_meta.description:
HP PAVILION 14-INCH CHROMEBOOK
 PRODUCT OVERVIEW
The HP Pavilion Chromebook gives you fast and easy access to the things you love and depend on, from a world of Google apps and services to your photos and social networks. The Chromebook features a 14-inch diagonal design, so you get full-size comfort without giving up full-on mobility.

KEY SPECIFICATIONS
14-inch screen | 4 GB memory | 16 GB hard drive | Intel Core i5 processor | Yes camera 

 ENJOY INSTANT ACCESS TO YOUR DIGITAL LIFE
With your apps, documents, photos and more stored in the cloud with more security, the HP Pavilion Chromebook gives you fast access to your digital life in more places.1 Boot up or wake up quickly, thanks to a solid-state drive (SSD) 2 and cloud storage, you can get to all your favorite stuff faster.

FULL-SIZE CHROMEBOOK
We gave it a 14-inch diagonal HD display so you can see and do everything comfortably. At less than an inch thin and starting at 3.96 lb (1.8 kg), it’s small enough to take anywhere. 

THE WEB WITHOUT THE WAIT
Experience the web the Chrome way. Just start typing into the browser and pages load at blazing speed, so you don’t have to wait for the stuff you want. Make your Chromebook uniquely you. Shop the Chrome Web Store and download apps for just about anything, from financial tools to games to social networks.

 THIS PRODUCT HAS
HP TRUEVISION HD WEBCAM
HP TrueVision HD Webcam with integrated digital microphone

ETHERNET
Integrated 10/100 BASE-T Ethernet LAN 

WIRELESS
802.11a/b/g/n; Bluetooth 

SPECIFICATIONS
Operating System
Google Chrome OS

Memory, Standard
35.5 cm (14"") HD BrightView LED-backlit (1366 x 768) 200 nits

Display
4 GB DDR3

Graphics
Intel HD graphics

Weight Note (Metric)
Weight will vary by configuration

Colour
Sparkling black

1. Wireless access point and internet service required and not included.

2. Select models.



BOX CONTAINS
1 x HP Pavilion 14-c002sa Chromebook (Sparkling black)
65W AC Power Adapter
power cord
4-cell Li-Ion battery
Google Chrome OS
HP Manual
feature_bullets: The HP Pavilion Chromebook gives you fast and easy access to the things you love and depend on, from a world of Google apps and services to your photos and social networks.

All constantly updated along with the OS and security, so you're always up to date. And since it's the first Chromebook with a 14-inch diagonal design, you get full-size comfort without giving up full-on mobility.

Refurbished - Grade C. Devices are in fair used condition. Devices could have cosmetic scratches, sticker staining, nicks, minor cracks, dents, and/or LCD/display imperfections, but do not materially affect the functionality of the device. US Keyboard Layout. Includes Power Adapter.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars28 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
